overview: Atchoum is happy to be home after being on the road with her show, but is horrified when she sees the chaotic and dusty state or her room. Despite her parents request to clean her mess, Atchoum embarks on a series of adventures that take her on a colourful and musical adventure to a universe that is full of lively songs from her recent musical album 'Le grand menage'.
title: Le grand ménage d'Atchoum
